Body:
I am doing a project on IOT using esp32 now I am using Adafruit IO as my MQTT web server but when I upload the code in the hardware it won't accept the code and one error message will be shown Error compiling for board ESP32 Dev Module." that I was found on the internet

"

Body: Have you followed the instructions in the error message?

This question is too broad. You are asking how to connect two devices when your problem is really only about the compilation of some code. Asking specifically about that is legitimate - avoid broadening the issue unnecessarily. You mention one error message" but the log you have includes others. The message you mention is just the build summary
column9: the actual cause of failure is indicated earlier in the build log.  Why would you choose not to enable verbose output if the summary output is unhelpful?!"

Body: Adafruit sells ESP32 hardware, why don't you follow some example of theirs?
Also realize you now need to change your wifi password and invalidate your adafruit IO key since you've published those to the world
